20110104023311.000|20110104023311.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:33:00 of 1:00:00
20110104023310.000|20110104023311.000|CC1|DEVELOPED SUCH A TEST AND TODAY 
20110104023311.000|20110104023313.000|CC1|JOHNSON & JOHNSON IS JOINING    
20110104023313.000|20110104023314.000|CC1|THEM TO SOMEDAY HELP MAKE IT    
20110104023314.000|20110104023317.000|CC1|AVAILABLE TO PATIENTS EVERYWHERE
20110104023317.000|20110104023319.000|CC1|MEDICAL CORRESPONDENT DR. JON   
20110104023319.000|20110104023320.000|CC1|LAPOOK EXPLAINS HOW THIS TEST   
20110104023320.000|20110104023321.000|CC1|WORKS AND WHY IT'S POTENTIALLY  
20110104023321.000|20110104023325.000|CC1|SO IMPORTANT.                   
20110104023325.000|20110104023327.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE CURRENT TOOLS  
20110104023327.000|20110104023328.000|CC1|FOR TRACKING CANCER ARE NOT     
20110104023328.000|20110104023329.000|CC1|ALWAYS SENSITIVE ENOUGH TO      
20110104023329.000|20110104023330.000|CC1|ANSWER THE MOST PRESSING        
20110104023330.000|20110104023332.000|CC1|QUESTIONS-- IS THE CANCER GONE? 
20110104023332.000|20110104023333.000|CC1|>> WE'RE KIND OF SHOOTING IN THE
20110104023333.000|20110104023333.000|CC1|DARK.                           
20110104023333.000|20110104023335.000|CC1|WE'RE TREATING PATIENTS BASED ON
20110104023335.000|20110104023335.000|CC1|WHAT SEEMS TO WORK AND OUR BEST 
20110104023335.000|20110104023337.000|CC1|GUESS.                          
20110104023337.000|20110104023338.000|CC1|>> Reporter: RESEARCHERS BELIEVE
20110104023338.000|20110104023339.000|CC1|THIS NEW TEST, USING JUST A     
20110104023339.000|20110104023341.000|CC1|TEASPOON OF BLOOD, MAY BE ABLE  
20110104023341.000|20110104023342.000|CC1|TO DETECT CANCER BEFORE IT SHOWS
20110104023342.000|20110104023344.000|CC1|UP ON SCANS.                    
20110104023344.000|20110104023345.000|CC1|>> IT WILL GIVE US A NONINVASIVE
20110104023345.000|20110104023347.000|CC1|OR A NON-PAINFUL WAY OF         
20110104023347.000|20110104023349.000|CC1|MONITORING A CANCER FOLLOWING A 
20110104023349.000|20110104023351.000|CC1|CANCER DATA DAY, WEEK TO WEEK   
20110104023351.000|20110104023352.000|CC1|WITHOUT HAVING TO DO REPEAT     
20110104023352.000|20110104023355.000|CC1|BIOPSIES.                       
20110104023355.000|20110104023356.000|CC1|>> Reporter: CANCERS SHED CELLS 
20110104023356.000|20110104023357.000|CC1|THAT CIRCULATE IN THE           
20110104023357.000|20110104023358.000|CC1|BLOODSTREAM AT EXTREMELY LOW    
20110104023358.000|20110104023359.000|CC1|LEVELS.                         
20110104023359.000|20110104023401.000|CC1|THIS TECHNOLOGY FINDS THEM      
20110104023401.000|20110104023402.000|CC1|BYPASSING A BLOOD SAMPLE THROUGH
20110104023402.000|20110104023404.000|CC1|A MICROCHIP COATED WITH         
20110104023404.000|20110104023405.000|CC1|ANTIBODIES THAT BIND ONLY TO THE
20110104023405.000|20110104023407.000|CC1|CANCER CELLS.

20110104023408.000|20110104023409.000|CC1|CANCER CELL AMONG A BILLION     
20110104023409.000|20110104023412.000|CC1|NORMAL ONES.

20110104023412.000|20110104023413.000|CC1|>> IT WOULD BE MOST HELP FOR    
20110104023413.000|20110104023416.000|CC1|PATIENTS WITH PROSTATE, BLADDER,

20110104025209.000|20110104025209.000|CC1|[ Male Announcer ]              
20110104025209.000|20110104025210.000|CC1|ONGLYZA SHOULD NOT BE USED      
20110104025210.000|20110104025210.000|CC1|TO TREAT TYPE 1 DIABETES        
20110104025210.000|20110104025213.000|CC1|OR DIABETIC KETOACIDOSIS.       
20110104025213.000|20110104025213.000|CC1|TELL YOUR DOCTOR                
20110104025213.000|20110104025215.000|CC1|IF YOU HAVE A HISTORY           
20110104025215.000|20110104025215.000|CC1|OR RISK                         
20110104025215.000|20110104025217.000|CC1|OF DIABETIC KETOACIDOSIS.       
20110104025217.000|20110104025217.000|CC1|ONGLYZA HAS NOT BEEN STUDIED    
20110104025217.000|20110104025220.000|CC1|WITH INSULIN.                   
20110104025220.000|20110104025220.000|CC1|USING ONGLYZA WITH MEDICINES    
20110104025220.000|20110104025222.000|CC1|SUCH AS SULFONYLUREAS           
20110104025222.000|20110104025224.000|CC1|MAY CAUSE LOW BLOOD SUGAR.      
20110104025224.000|20110104025224.000|CC1|SOME SYMPTOMS OF LOW BLOOD      
20110104025224.000|20110104025226.000|CC1|SUGAR ARE SHAKING,              
20110104025226.000|20110104025228.000|CC1|SWEATING AND RAPID HEARTBEAT.   
20110104025228.000|20110104025228.000|CC1|CALL YOUR DOCTOR IF YOU HAVE    
20110104025228.000|20110104025230.000|CC1|AN ALLERGIC REACTION LIKE RASH, 
20110104025230.000|20110104025230.000|CC1|HIVES OR SWELLING OF THE FACE,  
20110104025230.000|20110104025234.000|CC1|MOUTH OR THROAT.                
20110104025234.000|20110104025234.000|CC1|ASK YOUR DOCTOR                 
20110104025234.000|20110104025236.000|CC1|IF YOU ALSO TAKE A TZD          
20110104025236.000|20110104025236.000|CC1|AS SWELLING IN THE HANDS,       
20110104025236.000|20110104025238.000|CC1|FEET OR ANKLES MAY WORSEN.      
20110104025238.000|20110104025238.000|CC1|BLOOD TESTS WILL CHECK
